description: Historical atmoshere only simulation with historical forcings but with methane fixed at 1850 concentration levels.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 1, Historical perturbation, 1850 methane, 1850 CH4
long_name: historical SSTs and historical forcing, but with pre-industrial methane concentrations
rationale: Estimate ERFs through specified transient historical SST simulations.

requirements.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC
requirements.label: 1850-2014 165yrs

requirements.description: Impose historical non-chemically reactive Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas (WMGHG) concentrations.  No methane, nitrous oxide or halocarbons.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG, non-chemically reactive
requirements.label: Historical Non-Reactive WMGHG Concentrations

requirements.description: Impose historical concentrations of Nitrous Oxide (N2O).
requirements.label: Historical N2O Concentrations

requirements.description: Impose transient historical emissions of near term climate forcers (NTCF): namely tropospheric aerosols, and tropospheric ozone precursors.
requirements.keywords: Historical, NTCF, near term climate forcers
requirements.label: Historical NTCF Emissions

requirements.description: Impose historical concentrations of Ozone depleating Halocarbons (CFC/HCFC).
requirements.keywords: historical halocarbons, ODS, ozone depleting substances, CFCs, HCFCs
requirements.label: Historical Ozone Depleating Halocarbon Concentrations

requirements.description: Historical transient sea surface temperature from the Historical simulation.
requirements.label: Historical SST

requirements.description: Global gridded land-use forcing datasets to link historical land-use data and future projections.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
requirements.label: Historical Land Use

requirements.description: Solar forcing of the Earth system consistent with historical observations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Solar, Forcing, SSI, TSI, Proton Forcing, Electron Forcing
requirements.label: Historical Solar Forcing

requirements.description: Use an Atmosphere model with chemistry
requirements.label: AGCM-Chem Configuration
